text: Ivan VI Antonovich (Iván VI; Ioánn Antónovich; ; – ) was Tsar of Russia from 1740 to 1741 until he was removed from the position. == Murder == He was murdered in July 1764. Category:Emperors and Empresses of Russia Category:1740 births Category:1764 deaths Category:People from Saint Petersburg Category:18th century in Russia
title: Ivan VI of Russia
